Episodes.Title: New Guys
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight and Jim are intimidated by the office's newest additions, who are considered younger versions of themselves. Meanwhile, Andy tries to make Nellie's life miserable, and Angela tries to get rid of one of her cats.

Episodes.Title: Roy's Wedding
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Allison Silverman, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: After Roy's wedding, Jim and Pam wonder if they still have any secrets they're hiding from each other. Meanwhile, Clark tricks Erin into a "news audition," and Dwight challenges Nellie's new charity initiative.

Episodes.Title: Andy's Ancestry
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jonathan Green, Gabe Miller
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Nellie plays a trick on Andy after researching his ancestry, Dwight teaches Erin a new language, and Pam tries to teach Nellie how to drive.

Episodes.Title: Work Bus
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Brent Forrester, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: When Jim convinces Dwight that the building is unsafe, Dwight rents a bus and sets up the office inside. Nellie asks for Andy's help in adopting a baby. Meanwhile, Jim tries to make Pam happy with some pie.

Episodes.Title: Here Comes Treble
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Owen Ellickson, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: On Halloween, the Cornell a Capella group pays a visit to Andy, Dwight discovers that Nellie takes anxiety pills, and Pam disapproves of Jim's business decision.

Episodes.Title: The Boat
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Dan Sterling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Andy has one last chance to captain the family boat before he sells it, Jim, Pam, and Nellie prank Dwight with a radio interview, and Kevin finds out about Oscar's affair with Angela's husband.

Episodes.Title: The Whale
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Carrie Kemper, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: The office trains Dwight to sell to a female client without being offensive, only to discover that the client is Jan Levinson. Angela and Oscar both think the senator is cheating on them, and Jim has trouble on an important confer...

Episodes.Title: The Target
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Graham Wagner, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Angela orders a hit on Oscar for cheating with her husband, the office makes a tower with their customer complaint cards, Jim wines and dines Stanley and Phyllis in exchange for a favor, and Pam begins her mural.

Episodes.Title: Dwight Christmas
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Robert Padnick, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight puts together a Pennsylvania Dutch-themed office Christmas party, but he ends it abruptly because Jim has to leave for his other job. Meanwhile, Erin seeks comfort from a co-worker after a disappointing text from Andy.

Episodes.Title: Lice
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Niki Schwartz-Wright, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Pam causes a lice outbreak but lets Meredith take the blame, Jim has a business meeting with Dr. J, and some coworkers try to get Darryl and Val back together.

Episodes.Title: Suit Warehouse
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Dan Greaney, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight and Clark pose as father and son to get an account, Darryl goes for an interview with Jim's new business, and everybody in the office goes crazy over a new espresso machine.

Episodes.Title: Customer Loyalty
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jonathan Green, Gabe Miller
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight tries to keep Darryl from leaving Dunder Mifflin, Jim misses his daughter's recital because of an important business meeting, and Nellie is worried that Erin will dump Andy for Pete.

Episodes.Title: Junior Salesman
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Carrie Kemper, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight gets to hire a new salesman to replace Jim when he is at his other job. But will he promote Clark or go with one of his unqualified friends instead?

Episodes.Title: Vandalism
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Owen Ellickson, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Pam tries to find out who vandalized her mural, Darryl finds out that Jim is a slob, and Oscar and Kevin go to Angela and The Senator's child's first birthday party.

Episodes.Title: Couples Discount
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Allison Silverman, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Andy returns after three months to an angry office and an even angrier girlfriend, and Jim's Valentines Day with Pam does not go as planned.

Episodes.Title: Moving On
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Graham Wagner, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Andy finds out that Erin dumped him for Pete, Dwight gets Angela's help taking care of his aunt, and Pam interviews with a real estate firm whose boss is a carbon-copy of Michael Scott.

Episodes.Title: The Farm
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight's brother and sister return to the farm for an aunt's funeral. Meanwhile, Todd Packer returns to make amends to his former co-workers, but Pam is skeptical.

Episodes.Title: Promos
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Tim McAuliffe, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: The release of the documentary promos creates tension for the Dunder Mifflin employees, Dwight considers a business venture with his girlfriend's family, and Jim and Darryl have an awkward business meeting with baseball player Rya...

Episodes.Title: Stairmageddon
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Dan Sterling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight shoots Stanley with a bull tranquilizer after he refuses to go on a sales call, Jim and Pam head to marriage counseling, The Senator comes out of the closet, and Andy tries to find a talent agent.

Episodes.Title: Paper Airplane
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Halsted Sullivan, Warren Lieberstein
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: The employees hold a paper airplane competition, Andy gets an acting role in a workplace safety video, and Jim and Pam's marriage tensions continue to build.

Episodes.Title: Livin' the Dream
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Niki Schwartz-Wright, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight becomes regional manager after Andy quits his job, Jim dedicates more time to his Dunder Mifflin job to save his marriage, and Angela has problems with her new living arrangements after her breakup with The Senator.

Episodes.Title: A.A.R.M.
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Brent Forrester, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: Dwight prepares for a marriage proposal and hires an assistant for his assistant, Andy auditions for a singing program, Darryl tries to leave his job without a fuss, and Pam has second thoughts about Jim staying in Scranton.

Episodes.Title: Finale
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski, Jenna Fischer
Episodes.Plot: One year later, Dunder Mifflin employees past and present reunite for a panel discussion about the documentary and to attend Dwight and Angela's wedding.
